results.title: Metformin protects against cardiac and renal damage in diabetic cardiac arrest patients.
results.text_hl: We tested the association of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with markers of @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac and renal injury@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Post_Cardiac_Arrest_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080942 @@@diabetic post-arrest@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
